commit.message:
arm.c (arm_init_libfuncs): Use __aeabi_idiv and __aeabi_uidiv.

	* config/arm/arm.c (arm_init_libfuncs): Use __aeabi_idiv and
	__aeabi_uidiv.

From-SVN: r106492

files.patch:

+	__aeabi_uidiv.
